message.body: My bus gets to ny at 4 so maybe around 5pm
If u r going to be at work, I could just meet u at the opening
I'm off and will be at home all day... So feel free to call and come over when you arrive
I'm gonna invite a couple of my friends/colleges to the opening? We have alot of admirers of your work...that cool? 5 ppl plus jui and I.
There's a FB post in tgr stephan romano page looks like it isn't a problem if ppl come, right...

Yeah that's great. I am trying to finish this guy up tonight, and frame it in the morning. It's the coyote skull that is the same size as the laser-cut you have. I tried 3 times to do a Lasercut of it but it would cut over the lines and fall apart every time. I'm going to do a hand cut edition of three. You and Zui have first dibs, if you want it, but I can't sell it for the same price as the other since it's taken me over two days to cut out just one of them and I still have to frame it. I'm not sure what my retail price will be for it but I could sell it to you for $400. I'll bring it up if I finish it in time so you can at least see it and decide then
Jui likes it! She says she wants it in a white frame tho
I think our realtor might come... He likes your stuff could sell to him
Yeah, I have a white frame already made for it
Ok well I'll try to finish it and bring it. No pressure to buy it or anything. I had just talked to Zui about this one as a laser cut a long time ago and it wasn't able to happen
There's no replacing the hand cut I guess
Best of luck finishing . See you tomorrow!
I m walking to your house now
